en-US.title: A P Medical Group: Comprehensive Healthcare Practice
en-US.description: A P Medical Group, located in Las Vegas, Nevada, is a leading healthcare practice offering diverse services including allergies, weight loss, hormone therapy, wellness and physicals, amongst others. They pride themselves on being LGBTQ+ friendly, providing quality care tailored to suit the unique health needs of this community, such as HRT for gender transition affirmation. If you're seeking unbiased, safe and comprehensive health care, A P Medical Group is dedicated to supporting you.

address: 2110 E Flamingo Rd #100, Las Vegas, NV 89119, USA
